name: Apiko
description:
Apiko is a top web and mobile development company, based in Ukraine.
We build stable and reliable applications using modern JavaScript technologies (React, React Native, Express, GraphQL, Meteor, Node-RED, MongoDB) and deliver the products for global brands that raise millions USD of investments for our Clients.
Apiko key services:
- Online marketplace development - we have strong expertise in building an outstanding multi-sided web and mobile marketplace platforms to let you break new ground in your business growth.
- Dedicated team - we provide you with a team or one engineer who has the expertise you’re looking for, and we take responsibility for the performance of these engineers or teams.
- Software product development - we take full responsibility for managing the web and mobile product development life cycle from planning to implementation to support and maintenance of your product.
- Product MVP development - we build an unconventional product vision for your startup by developing a Minimum Viable Product in only 4 weeks.
- Quality assurance & testing 
- UX/UI design
Our main goal - we want each of our Customers to be completely satisfied with our work.
Check out our Clutch contribution on how to scale your online marketplace application: https://clutch.co/app-developers/resources/how-to-scale-online-marketpla...  
Also, we'd like to share our technical content and experience on Hackernoon, stay tuned for more updates: https://hackernoon.com/@apiko_software
